word: VISITED OAKLAND FOR "AN IMPORTANT COUNCIL MEETING" LATE IN APRIL.  SPOKE SEVERAL TIMES IN CAMP MEETING AT PETALUMA JUNE 5-15; ALSO FILLED SEVERAL LOCAL SPEAKING APPOINTMENTS.  SPENT SEPT. 10 IN OAKLAND, EN ROUTE SOUTH; STOPPED AT SANTA BARBARA TO COUNSEL RE ESTABLISHING A SANITARIUM AND RESTAURANT THERE; WENT TO SAN FERNANDO TO SEE A PROPERTY THAT MIGHT BE PURCHASED FOR SCHOOL SITE.  LABORED IN CAMP MEETING AT LOS ANGELES, SEPT. 12-21.  ALSO VISITED OTHER POSSIBLE LOCATIONS FOR SANITARIUM WORK.
